item.title: Gui Pimentel may12 NU&OLD DISCO SPECIAL 3
item.description: Be the change you want to see in the world MIX
item.itunes:subtitle: Be the change you want to see in the world MIX
item.itunes:summary: Gui Pimentel may12 NU&OLD DISCO SPECIAL 3. This month we have another of the Nu&Old Disco Specials, with cool edits of old favorites mixed with some new and interesting NuDisco gems. This is a 1-hour House mix Podcast. I publish a mix every month featuring an eclectic choice of today's house music. Bookings & Contact : gui_pimentel@uol.com.br
item.itunes:keywords: house, dj sessions, gui pimentel, electronic music, dj mix, techno, techhouse
item.itunes:author: DJ Gui Pimentel
